<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/1bd3cb201983859d86d644eef9e98cd3e9de7261|patch 8.2.2549: crash after using "g:" in a for loop>
patch 8.2.2549: crash after using "g:" in a for loop

Problem:    Crash after using "g:" in a for loop.
Solution:   Increment the reference count. (closes #7892)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2549: crash after using "g:" in a for loop · vim/vim@1bd3cb2
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2549: crash after using "g:" in a for loop · vim/vim@1bd3cb2
attachments.text: Problem: Crash after using "g:" in a for loop. Solution: Increment the reference count. (closes #7892)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/7d41410a455ba62128655beb91c35d3fba299287|patch 8.2.2548: May get stuck in the cmdline window using :normal>
patch 8.2.2548: May get stuck in the cmdline window using :normal

Problem:    May get stuck in the cmdline window using :normal.
Solution:   Have nv_esc() return K_IGNORE.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2548: May get stuck in the cmdline window using :normal · vim/vim@7d41410
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2548: May get stuck in the cmdline window using :normal · vim/vim@7d41410
attachments.text: Problem: May get stuck in the cmdline window using :normal. Solution: Have nv_esc() return K_IGNORE.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/2c6553498e790604f50016d8435403523a2576d6|patch 8.2.2547: "%" command not accurate for big files>
patch 8.2.2547: "%" command not accurate for big files

Problem:    "%" command not accurate for big files.
Solution:   Make it more accurate for files up to 21M lines. (Dominique Pellé,
            closes #7889)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2547: "%" command not accurate for big files · vim/vim@2c65534
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2547: "%" command not accurate for big files · vim/vim@2c65534
attachments.text: Problem: "%" command not accurate for big files. Solution: Make it more accurate for files up to 21M lines. (Dominique Pellé, closes #7889)

patch 8.2.2546: typo in mouse key name

Problem:    Typo in mouse key name.
Solution:   Fix the typo. (issue #4725)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/eba13e4ea28f133ff65f6b426428f49a9bd711b0|patch 8.2.2545: errors and crash when terminal window is zero height>
patch 8.2.2545: errors and crash when terminal window is zero height

Problem:    Errors and crash when terminal window is zero height. (Leonid V.
            Fedorenchik)
Solution:   Do not resize when width or height is zero. (closes #7890)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2545: errors and crash when terminal window is zero height · vim/vim@eba13e4
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2545: errors and crash when terminal window is zero height · vim/vim@eba13e4
attachments.text: Problem: Errors and crash when terminal window is zero height. (Leonid V. Fedorenchik) Solution: Do not resize when width or height is zero. (closes #7890)
